alert.note: Alert for Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 11:18PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lake County through 1145 PM PST... At 1116 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Anderson Springs, or near Middletown, moving northeast. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, frequent lightning and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Clearlake, Seigler Springs, Forest Lake, Adams, Loch Lomond, Anderson Springs, Hobergs, Ettawa Springs, Konocti Bay, Whispering Pines, Hidden Valley Lake, Lower Lake, Cobb, Clearlake Oaks and Clearlake Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
